review: So easy to set up and use. Support keeps on growing also!
author: William Lau

review: Great device. I only use it for YouTube and Netflix but it works great. If you are looking to cut your cable cord all together then I would buy a Roku but for the price and what it gives you the chrome cast is fantastic.
author: DEAN

review: What a great device! Seamless installation, and easy to stream from phone, tablet, or computer. If you use Google Chrome as your internet browser, they have an "add on" available to stream directly from the tab you wish streamed. Bought this instead of an Apple TV and I am happy with this purchase.
author: Micah O

review: works great, we love it for watching downloaded videos from our other devices
author: Natalie Rohde "Natalie Rohde"

review: The price was amazingly good and competitive, the shipment was also fast. I love my item 👍 thank you
author: adel belkady

review: It was a great idea, but it doesn't fit any of the TVs I bought it for. The TVs are probably too old.
author: Linda Yezak "pprmint777"
